value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
value.excerpt: Think you need to always refresh your Power BI dataset even why just adding a measure? Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit.  ALM Toolkit: http://alm-toolkit.com/  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-process

value.title: Different ways to work with Microsoft Excel in Power BI

value.title: Do you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI? Nope! (Quick Measures)
value.excerpt: Everyone tells you that you need a date table for time intelligence in Power BI. Not so fast! Patrick shows you how you can use quick measures, like year over year, with a quick measure and no date table!  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/quickmeasuresample  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Drilling into drillthrough in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can use the drillthrough feature within Power BI Desktop. He also looks at how you can drill to multiple fields at the same time. The back image can also be changed and Patrick shows you how to do it!  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com --

value.title: Dynamic titles with multiple slicers or filters in Power BI
value.excerpt: We've talked about dynamic titles in Power BI before. But, what if you wanted to combine multiple values into that dynamic title. Patrick shows you how using a little DAX! value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
value.excerpt: In this video, I go over the embed a dashboard sample and walk you through how to actually embed a dashboard into your application. This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.  Embed Dashboards in Your Applications to Monitor Your Business in Context (Blog) - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/embed-dashboard/

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

value.title: Exploring Microsoft Purview for data governance
value.excerpt: You've probably heard of Microsoft Purview somewhere. Buck Woody joins Patrick to highlight how Microsoft Purview can help you with data governance.
